remarks: The limit of a monotonic sequence is an upper bound.  (Contributed by NM, 18-Mar-2005.)  (Revised by Mario Carneiro, 10-Feb-2014.)
statement:
clim2ser.1 $e |- Z = ( ZZ>= ` M ) $.
climub.2 $e |- ( ph -> N e. Z ) $.

climub.4 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) e. RR ) $.
climub.5 $e |- ( ( ph /\ k e. Z ) -> ( F ` k ) <_ ( F ` ( k + 1 ) ) ) $.
climub $p |- ( ph -> ( F ` N ) <_ A ) $.

$d F k $.
